title: The End of the Nancy J.
creator_credit: Bernard Devlin and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Bill Cluney’s fishing boat, the ”Nancy J”, is unsafe. Pleas by a marine engineer to make it safe are ignored. Then Bill becomes frightened by the local undertaker’s interest in him as a high death risk, and he begins to install safety equipment. But before the repairs are completed, Bill sets out to sea and the ”Nancy J” explodes. Cast includes: Stan Kane, James Barron, Donald Young and Len Watt
creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Devlin and National Film Board of Canada
